channel.title: Stephen Suen
channel.description: Stephen Suen is a designer and developer of data visualizations and human-centered products.

item.title: Welcome to v3.0
item.description:
Old websites are the time capsules of the internet age. Instead of capturing the moment in the form of random trinkets and baubles, they freeze time via dated design patterns and <marquee> tags. Like their physical counterparts, they can store embarrassing photos or now-awkward pieces of writing. But an old website is not deliberately buried under inches of dirt in the backyard — there’s nothing to explictly signify that it’s out of date. Someone can find it in the wild and take what’s on it at face value.

Continue reading →
